external_games.name: Nanafushigi: Nanase to Fushigi no Otome-dou

name: Nanafushigi: Nanase to Fushigi no Otome-dou
summary: Nanafushigi: Nanase to Fushigi no Otome-dou is a roguelike game on PC. This game is a fan game of One: Kagayaku Kisetsu e. The goal is to break through mysterious dungeons like Fuurai no Shiren, including some proprietary systems.
